settings.title: Why choose posture clothing from ActivePosture®?
settings.code: Posture Shirt™ is the best choice when looking for pain reduction in neck, shoulders and back or if you are looking for a faster recovery after an injury, for instance, a shoulder injury. The shirt may also help prevent injuries when you do gym activities or other physical activities. How can the shirt do that? The shirt is anatomically constructed with NeuroBands™, which is tension panel bands that activates and stimulate specific muscle groups and joints to help improve your posture. This controlled resistance causes your muscles to contract to increase strength and keep you in an upright position. For those suffering from a shoulder injury or have recently had surgery, we recommend the zipper version of our Posture Shirt. We also have a wide selection of other products that provide back support, including three different posture braces and a lumbar support belt. What these products have in common are posture correction and pain relief.

settings.title: The original product for posture correction
settings.text: The original posture clothing from ActivePosture®  is the only that is both FDA-registered and CE-registrered as a medical device and can be bought onwww.activeposture.co.ukor one of our licensed resellers. We are a UK-based company which gives you peace of mind that should you end up with a faulty product or just decide that it is not a product for you, you can easily return it and at no cost.

settings.title: Posture clothing with 100% satisfaction guarante
settings.text: Peace of mind: At ActivePosture® we always offer free returns and a generous 30-day risk-free trial period of our products. Use your new product for all your everyday activities and find out if it lives up to your expectations. With our 100% satisfaction guarantee you can return the product, despite it being used, within 30 days for a full refund, no questions asked.

settings.title: From Kinesiotape to patented posture clothing
settings.text: Posture corrective clothingactivates the back muscles, shoulders and shoulder blades without bracing your muscles or joints. The technology behind ActivePosture's posture clothing is inspired by Kinesiotape - a treatment method often used by physiotherapists and chiropractors to treat pain and tension in the neck, shoulders and back. Kinesiotaping is also frequently used by professional athletes to stimulate specific muscle groups and for posture correction.

settings.accordion__description: Posture clothing from ActivePosture® is manufactured using a unique composition of polyester, spandex and nylon which makes the clothing durable and breathable while keeping its elasticity, as well as being comfortable to wear. It is designed with the patented NeuroBand™ technology, which is inspired by Kinesiotape. The clothes aim to reflect the contraction and expansion of the muscles to promote natural posture correction.

Posture clothing from ActivePosture® provide posture support and can be used by anyone. We sell posture correcting t-shirts, bras and vests, all designed for posture correction by helping to activate the muscles and blood circulation and hereby remind the body to hold a better posture. ActivePosture's posture correcting t-shirts and bras can be used at any time; at work, when going for walks, doing your shopping, exercising and all other daily activities. In every kind of activity where you wish for posture support. To get the most out of your posture clothing we recommend that you carefully read the instructions which are enclosed with each product. This way you will be able to get the optimal posture correction effect out of our products.

If you have an injury, or if you have a spinal disc herniation, scoliosis, arthritis or related condition, you may benefit from wearing posture corrective clothing. If you haven't been given a diagnosis, we strongly recommend consulting a professional to discuss the best way forward for you. Some professionals may recommend our Posture Shirt™ others our Spinal Q, a vest for posture correction with our most powerful support function. Our products are registered as medical devices and as such you have a guarantee that they are safe for you to use. If you need any advice about our products and which one will be best for you, you can always contact the customer service team.
